Liquidity planning
Keep track of your liquidity and cash flow at all times. Actual data is imported directly from bexio and linked to the planned data (budget) recorded in Tresio. Once set up, your liquidity plan then automates itself with each login.
Daily Reconciliation: The automatic import of outstanding invoices, customer subscriptions, HR data, and bank information from connected third-party systems enables a high level of automation, making work significantly easier.
Loan Module: Record outstanding loans, such as mortgages or business credits, in our powerful loan module and maintain a clear overview. Interest and amortization payments are automatically calculated and factored into your liquidity planning.
HR Planning: Your employees are your most valuable asset. Simulate new hires and assess the impact of irregular payments such as social security contributions, AHV, and 13th-month salaries on your liquidity.
Rolling liquidity planning: Plan your cash flows on a daily, weekly, and monthly basis with a maximum planning horizon of 3 years.
HR Planning: Your employees are your most valuable asset. Simulate new hires and see the impact that irregular payments, such as social security contributions, AHV, and 13th-month salaries, have on your liquidity.

Scenario analysis
With Tresio’s scenario analysis, you’re always on the safe side: Build layered scenarios to simulate your financial options and always have a Plan B ready. Our detailed evaluations provide deep insights into the impact of each decision, helping you make well-informed choices.
Detailed evaluations: Our in-depth analyses provide you with comprehensive insights into the financial performance of your scenarios. Analyze the impact of each change in real-time, receive precise reports, and identify the key levers for your financial planning.
Sequential scenarios: With Tresio, create seamlessly layered scenarios that simulate different future forecasts step-by-step. You can combine various assumptions to model realistic developments and gain a better understanding of the long-term impacts on your liquidity.
Plan B always within reach: With Tresio, you have an alternative at hand at any time. Our scenario analysis allows you to anticipate various financial developments and always keep a Plan B ready to respond flexibly to changes. This way, you safeguard against unexpected events and maintain your ability to act.

Dashboards for entrepreneurCFOs
With Tresio, your financial data and KPIs—from liquidity and bank data to figures directly from bexio—are clearly and intuitively presented in graphical form. Thanks to fully customizable widgets, you can personalize your dashboard and capture the key metrics that matter most to you at a glance. This way, you always maintain full control over your finances.
Soon, Tresio will be seamlessly integrated with third-party applications to transfer your financial data to other systems. Additionally, whitelabeling will be available, allowing you to use the platform in your own corporate design.
Soon, you will be able to export and share your reports and dashboards as PDFs. This feature simplifies the documentation and sharing of important financial data with your team or external partners.
Tresio integrates your liquidity planning, bank data, and bexio figures into a centralized dashboard. This provides you with a comprehensive, up-to-date overview of your financial situation—without needing to switch between different tools.
Customize your dashboard with fully configurable widgets tailored to your needs. Choose which key metrics and data sources are displayed to keep the most important information in view at all times.
With Tresio, your financial data is visualized in easy-to-understand graphics, allowing you to grasp complex information at a glance. Whether it’s liquidity, revenues, or KPIs— all relevant figures are presented clearly and concisely.

Reporting
Your bexio figures, individually analyzed: whether custom KPIs, cost center analyses, cash flow statements, or industry-specific breakdowns of balance sheets and income statements — with Tresio, you can view your bexio data in a new light.
Fully customizable: Create the reports and analyses you truly need to track and understand your figures.
Reports at the push of a button: once set up, Tresio’s reports automatically update with each entry in bexio. This gives you a continuous overview of your figures — entirely without manual effort.
Comprehensive support: Setting up a reporting cockpit can be challenging — deciding which figures to track and how to structure your reporting most efficiently. Our experienced team is happy to assist you with expert guidance and advice.

Tresio for larger organizations
Tresio is not only popular among smaller SMEs but also holds its ground in larger organizations. Take advantage of the agility and power of modern software to elevate your liquidity planning and reporting to the next level!
Comprehensive Access Management: Define who in your organization can access specific data and information in Tresio, assigning read or write permissions as needed. This streamlines cross-team collaboration and facilitates work with external parties, such as fiduciaries. Two-factor authentication (2FA) ensures additional security.
Multi-Banking Cockpit: Tresio is compatible with over 10,000 banks across Switzerland, the EU, the USA, and Canada. Forget countless logins — Tresio gives you an instant overview of all cash flows. Starting in 2025, a payment transactions module will also be available.
Consolidation: Plan your liquidity at the individual company level and consolidate across entities at the group level. This includes cross-country and multi-currency capabilities, even when individual entities use different systems and banks.

Create comprehensive financial reports that give your clients the clarity they need to understand their financial situation and make well-informed decisions. Once set up, the reports automate themselves, requiring only an initial effort while generating ongoing advisory revenue.
